data.message: I need to know how we can delete the 10 facebook accounts my step-son created at school. He is 17 and special needs (autistic) and does not know how to set up an e-mail account. We think another teen at his high school that is not autistic helped him set up multiple accounts, which my step-son probably wanted because he could not remember the passwords to them. We can't trust him with an account unless we can monitor it. We would like to keep one of the accounts open that we can monitor for him.

replies.message: Hi Lisa. Here is a resource on how to permanently delete an account: http://bit.ly/2fixTZ5. Hope this helps. -Nick
Nick, this is helpful if you know the password. But we don't know the passwords to these accounts and  my step son doesn't either because he forgets things easily. Anyway for FB to delete these?
